title: 换五边形材质的时候游戏崩溃
author: a17245632
txt_content:
游戏版本1.13.1
材质版本是1.13

游戏内存2g启动
错误信息如下
 A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment:
#
#  EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x00007ffd47411d7b, pid=11544, tid=0x000000000000259c
#
# JRE version: Java(TM) SE Runtime Environment (8.0_131-b11) (build 1.8.0_131-b11)
# Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (25.131-b11 mixed mode windows-amd64 compressed oops)
# Problematic frame:
# C  [ig75icd64.dll+0x91d7b]
#
# Failed to write core dump. Minidumps are not enabled by default on client versions of Windows
#
# An error report file with more information is saved as:
# F:\我的世界\.minecraft\hs_err_pid11544.log
#
# If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit:
#   http://bugreport.java.com/bugreport/crash.jsp
# The crash happened outside the Java Virtual Machine in native code.
# See problematic frame for where to report the bug.
#
AL lib: (EE) alc_cleanup: 2 devices not closed

replies.author: Abraham511
replies.txt_content:
解决方案：
①：建议用Java 7
②：可以尝试一下，将五边形材质包里面的一部分材质，替换到另一个材质包，然后加载“另一个”材质包，如果不崩溃，可以用这个方法去试一下是哪部分导致的崩溃~

replies.author: zyjking
replies.txt_content: 是java出错了，尝试更新到最新版本，或者降级

replies.author: a17245632
replies.txt_content:
zyjking 发表于 2018-9-21 14:14
是java出错了，尝试更新到最新版本，或者降级
更换其他材质包都不崩溃  就五边形崩溃

replies.author: zyjking
replies.txt_content:
a17245632 发表于 2018-9-21 14:23
更换其他材质包都不崩溃  就五边形崩溃
那可能是材质包中的某个特定文件触发了错误
你有没有更新或者降级java？
如果问题仍然存在，清除一下java缓存再试
